entry.title: Crown Verity 2620-SS - Propane Commercial Patio Heater
entry.summary:
Vendor: Crown Verity
Type: Patio Heater
Price: 571.00

The Crown Verity 2620-SS is a unique patio heater that doesn't sacrifice style for portability. With an included wheel kit, the heater is quite easy to move. Additionally, both its head and body are constructed of weather-resistant 304 stainless steel.

This patio heater holds 20 or 30 lb propane tanks. The burn time is 10+ hours on the highest setting, and 12 - 15 hours on the low and medium settings.

      • Piezo electric ignition system/fail safe pilot system
      • Provides a clean circle of warmth
      • Easy on/off tank access
      • Weather resistant construction
      • Adjustable heat output
      • Easy to move wheel kit included
      • High output & fuel-efficient burner
      • Anti-tilt wheelbase with safety cut off switch
      • Holds 20 or 30 Lb. propane tanks
      • USA and Canada approvals through ETL to CSA and UL standards
      • More standard features
      • Reflector clearance - 24” from top - 36” to the sides
      • Heavy duty 304 stainless steel body and head
      • Burn time 10+ hours on HI; 12-15 hours on low and medium setting
      • Hose & regulator included

    VIDEO

    SPECS

    Model CV-2620-SS
    Dimensions (H) 87"
    Weight 75 lb
    BTUH 45,000

    WARRANTY

    One year limited parts warranty.

    DOWNLOAD SPEC SHEET

entry.title: Crown Verity - Mobile Commercial Outdoor Grill
entry.summary:
Vendor: Crown Verity
Type: BBQ
Price: 2218.00 - 5848.00 (26 variants)

This is Crown Verity's main line of commercial outdoor BBQs. They come in five different sizes and can be ordered with different packages and accessories, making them perfect for any kind of restaurant, patio, or clubhouse -- or for the professional domestic chef who wants to show off to his neighbours. You can order these grills in either liquid propane or natural gas.

These BBQs have all been designed with high-quality 304 stainless steel (as compared to 430 stainless steel), so they are incredibly durable and easy to clean. The burners are 15,000 BTU per hour and are placed every 5.75" to ensure even cooking. The stainless steel burners carry a 10 year warranty, and the cooking grills carry a lifetime warranty.

For options and accessories -- the accessories packages for the 30" and 36" grills include a roll dome, removable end shelf, adjustable bun rack, and a cover. The wind guard packages include wind guards. And the roll dome packages include a roll dome and bun rack. Please note, the pictures shown are for illustration purposes only. The actual product may vary due to product enhancement and accessories.

      • Made in Canada
      • Gas grill constructed of 304 stainless steel including grids, burners and all fasteners
      • Deep, 21" cooking surface
      • 15,000 BTU per hour stainless steel burners
      • Two 14" wheels and two total lock casters
      • Ready to use: ships completely assembled on a skid
      • Tank holder(s) on back of unit that hold 20 lb propane tank(s)
      • Storage shelf and angled legs for rock solid durability
      • Includes water pans with drain ports to ease cleaning and help eliminate grease fires from occurring
      • 16 gauge stainless steel radiants that remain in place during transportation and cleaning

SPECS

entry.title: Crown Verity PZ-48-MB - Mobile Outdoor Pizza Oven with Four Burners
entry.summary:
Vendor: Crown Verity
Type: Outdoor Pizza Oven
Price: 7462.00

Crown Verity's PZ-48-MB is a mobile, outdoor pizza oven that runs on propane or natural gas. It's perfect for bringing pizza to an outdoor or patio setting, without losing-out on the commercial quality your customers have come to expect.

The PZ-48-MB has four burners. It comes to your house fully assembled, and is constructed of high quality materials: one of which is 304 stainless steel. And whether you're wanting to cater an outdoor, public event or cook for your neighbours on the back patio, these pizza ovens have maximum mobility and can go with you wherever you decide to cook.

It has a 5,000 BTUH pilot tube system and 12,500 BTUH stainless steel burners. And, its volcanic stone cooking style helps to absorb high heat levels and promote even cooking that doesn't make your food stick. Ultimately, this oven incorporates three combinations of heat sources to cook the perfect pizza: direct, convection, and radiant.

      • Has four burners
      • Constructed of 304 stainless steel
      • Extremely mobile
      • Tank holder(s) on back of unit that hold 20 lb. propane tank(s)
      • 12,500 BTUH stainless steel burners 
      • 5,000 BTUH pilot tube system
      • Volcano stone to aid in cooking
      • Light manually or with piezo igniter
      • Dual dome system to cool external service
      • Has both front and end shelves

VIDEO

SPECS

Model PZ-48-MB
Dimensions (WDH) 70" x 28" x 53" 
Cooking Surface 47.5" x 16"
﻿BTUH 55,000
Weight 425 lb
Burners 4

WARRANTY

One year parts and labour warranty. Ninety days on the stones. Ten years on the burners. 

DOWNLOAD SPEC SHEET

entry.title: Crown Verity EHS - Economy Portable Outdoor Hand Sink
entry.summary:
Vendor: Crown Verity
Type: Hand Sink
Price: 1262.00 - 2699.00 (2 variants)

Crown Verity's economy hand sink is perfect for any business looking for an easy-to-transport outdoor hand washing sink. It offers an extra-wide wash basin, soap and paper towel dispensers, and hands-free foot pump operation. It is simple to service thanks to easy-flow drainage, roll-and-go wheels, and a slim profile. It's available as either a cold water or warm model version.

      • Moves like a hand truck - use the built-in handle to tilt the economy sink back onto its wheels and roll away
      • Heavy duty, non marking rubber wheels make drop off and pickup a breeze
      • Lightweight - only 189 pounds when filled with water
      • Nearly 300 uses on a single, 15 gallon fill up
      • Drain hose included for hassle-free, quick clean out
      • Easy to store thanks to slim profile
      • Extra large basin allows for full forearm immersion
      • Foot pump for hygienic “hands-free” operation
      • Buy Canadian! Made in Ontario! Buy quality and support the economy

SPECS

Model CV-EHS (or CV-EHS-E)
Weight 50 lb when empty
Weight 189 lb when full
Fresh Water Capacity 15 Gallons
Gray Water Capacity 19 Gallons
Overall Dimensions (WDH) 18" x 22" x 62"

This is a special order item and may have a lead time of 10-12 weeks.

entry.title: Crown Verity PHS-5 - Portable Outdoor Hand Sink
entry.summary:
Vendor: Crown Verity
Type: Hand Sink
Price: 1756.00 - 2575.00 (2 variants)

The Crown Verity PHS-5 portable hand sink adds sanitary on-site handwashing to any outdoor cooking situation. It can provide convenient water in an easy-to-transport polyethylene construction wherever there is an electrical outlet.

This unit is shipped fully assembled and ready to use, with removable fresh and waste water tanks, a 12-foot plug-in cord for standard wall plugs, and city warm water and drain hook ups. You can order this unit with warm and cold water, or just cold water.

      • Has an automatic foot pump for hands free operation
      • Rugged Polyethylene construction
      • Arrives fully assembled and ready to use
      • NSF, CSA, and Ul certified
      • Hot and cold water capability
      • Comes with lockable cabinet
      • 20-litre fresh water and 30-litre waste water tanks
      • 2-gallon 120v water heater and a 12-foot cord that can be plugged in anywhere

entry.summary:
Vendor: Crown Verity
Type: Hand Sink
Price: 2333.00 - 3457.00 (8 variants)

This portable, outdoor hand sink from Crown Verity can be a few different configurations. It can be ordered as a single, double, or triple sink. Or it can be ordered in a "space save" variety. And each of these configuration can be purchased as a cold water unit.

These sinks have been designed for the large community outdoor function, when hand-washing is a must. It includes a pump-saver foot switch to eliminate pump burn out, allowing the operator to use the foot pedal to turn the faucet on/of.

entry.title: Crown Verity 3WHS - Hot Dog Steamer & Bun Warmer - 48 Pounds of Hot Dogs & 48 Buns
entry.s:type: Hot Dog Steamer and Bun Steamer
entry.summary:
Vendor: Crown Verity
Type: Hot Dog Steamer and Bun Steamer
Price: 3731.00

The Crown Verity "3WHS" is an electric hot dog steamer that has been designed for high-volume stadiums, arenas, price clubs, universities, hospitals, and contract feeders. This steamer comes complete with a custom pan package consisting of roll dome, perforated pans, steaming baskets, 8" deep shoulder pans, lids, and brackets. It has a high-quality, heavy-duty stainless steel construction, that you'll be able to rely on for many years to come.

This commercial unit will preheat in only 15 - 20 minutes (or up to 30 minutes if you're using cold water). Refrigerated product will take about 15 minutes to reach 160 degrees Fahrenheit internally. It can hold 48 hot dog buns in the centre warmer, and 24 pounds of hot dogs on either side of the steamer.

      • Stainless Steel Construction
      • Comes with 4 adjustable legs (not shown)
      • Each side holds up to 24 pounds
      • Centre bun warmer holds up to 4 dozen buns
      • Preheats in 15 - 20 minutes, up to 30 minutes if using cold water
      • Refrigerated product will take approximately 15 minutes to reach 160 degrees Fahrenheit internally.
      • ETL Sanitation listed, all units are NSF, CSL, UL or equal approved
      • Buy Canadian! Made in Ontario! Buy quality and support the economy

entry.title: Crown Verity PF-2 - 80 lb. Commercial Outdoor Fryer - 180,000 BTU
entry.summary:
Vendor: Crown Verity
Type: Outdoor Fryer
Price: 5531.00

The Crown Verity "PF-2" is a double-tank commercial outdoor fryer which has a capacity of 35 - 40 pounds per tank, with 90,000 BTUH per tank in liquid propane or natural gas. It's been designed specifically for outdoor use only, and it comes with large 14" wheels, making it portable and easy to move: so this fryer is perfect for caterers, party rentals, and special events.

One 30 pound propane tank will give you approximately 10 - 12 hours of frying time - even longer if the thermostat is set at lower limits. With their 35 - 40 pound oil capacities, each tank can cook 60 - 65 pounds of frozen fries per hour.

      • Stainless steel cabinet, fry tanks
      • Two 14" wheels and two total lock casters
      • Two fry baskets per tank with plastic coated handles
      • Three heat exchanger tubes per tank positioned for easy cleaning
      • Tank holders to hold 30 Lb. vertical propane tanks
      • Galvanized steel fry tank covers
      • Two stage regulators and hoses on LP models
      • Ships fully assembled on a skid
      • 1.25" full port ball type drain valve with drain pipe extension
      • Buy Canadian! Made in Ontario! Buy quality and support the economy

VIDEO

Model PF-2
Thermostat 200° to 400° Fahrenheit
BTUH 90,000 per tank
Weight 301 lb
Capacity 35 - 40 lb. per tank
Cabinet Length 44.75"
Overall Dimensions (WDH) 53" x 30.5" x 48.75"

WARRANTY

One year parts and labor limited warranty. Stainless steel fry tank will be warranted for 1 year. If tank is found to have a leak and is verified by an authorized service agency, the fry tank only will be replaced. Replacement fryer tank will be warranted for the balance of the original warranty.

entry.title: Crown Verity - Mobile Commercial Outdoor Griddle
entry.summary:
Vendor: Crown Verity
Type: BBQ
Price: 2532.00 - 5090.00 (10 variants)

Crown Verity's series of outdoor mobile griddles have been designed to cook high volumes of products in a short period of time and have been built to convert with ease into a charbroiler for dual function use. These griddles have been constructed of 5/16" cold rolled steel with stainless steel splash guards and a removable stainless steel grease tray.

This griddle has been constructed out of high-quality 304 stainless steel (as compared to less-durable 430). It has 15,000 BTU-per-hour stainless steel burners that are evenly placed every 5.75" to ensure even eating, and the griddle can heat up to cooking temperature in 5 minutes. The burners carry a 10 year warranty.

Each model includes built-in tank holders that accommodate standard 20 pound propane tanks. You can order these griddles as either liquid propane or natural gas.

entry.title: Crown Verity - Towable Commercial Outdoor Grill - 46" grill
entry.summary:
Vendor: Crown Verity
Type: BBQ
Price: 9557.00 - 16580.00 (3 variants)

Crown Verity's series of towable outdoor "tailgate" grills allow you to tow up your BBQ to the venue and then fire up the large cooking area with six independently operated burners. You have three models to choose from. Each model has a cooking surface of 46" by 21".

The first model (TG-1) comes with two insulated storage compartments. The second model (TG-2) has no storage compartments. And the third model (TG-4) comes with a front storage compartment, two insulated storage compartments (like the TG-1), and a portable hot water dispenser and a single hand sink.

The grill bodies, cooking grates, burners, radiants, water pans, fasteners, and pilot tubes are all constructed of 304 series stainless steel for durability and ease of cleaning. Compared to units made of metal or 430 stainless steel, these units are built to last.

15,000 BTUH stainless steel burners are placed every 5.75" to ensure the most even heat pattern possible. These units heat up to cooking temperature within 5 minutes. The stainless steel burners and cooking grills carry a 10 year and lifetime warranty, respectively.

      • Made in Canada
      • 48" Gas grill constructed of 304 stainless steel including side shelves, trim, storage compartments, grids, burners and all fasteners
      • Deep, 21" cooking surface
      • 15,000 BTUH stainless steel burners
      • Holds two 30 pound propane tanks (not included)
      • TG-1 and TG-4 include two insulated storage compartments
      • Includes water pan with drain ports to ease cleaning and help eliminate grease fires from occurring
      • 16 gauge stainless steel radiants that remain in place during transportation and cleaning
      • Trailer conforms to all applicable motor vehicle safety standards

entry.title: Crown Verity BM-60 - 60" Commercial Charcoal Grill
entry.summary:
Vendor: Crown Verity
Type: BBQ
Price: 833.00

The Crown Verity BM-60 is a 60" commercial charcoal grill for real charcoal enthusiasts. It is a heavy duty unit constructed from 14- and 16-gauge cold-rolled steel, with a high-heat enamel finish. It includes quick-release removable legs on casters, and it offers a massive five feet of grilling space. The simple slide-action grate provides three height options for the grilling surface, for increased cooking temperature control. 

      • Designed for the rental industry and caterers
      • Cool touch handles on either end
      • Deep, 24" cooking surface
      • Raised grate lip to keep items on the grill
      • Long-lasting pin-system used on legs (not threads which are easily damaged)
      • 4 Swivel casters, 2 are lockable
      • Double-gusset support on each leg for sturdiness
      • Heavy duty 14- and 16-gauge cold rolled steel
      • High heat enamel finish
      • Quick release removable legs on casters
      • Five feet of grilling space
      • Buy Canadian! Made in Ontario! Buy quality and support the economy

VIDEO

SPECS

Cooking Surface 60" x 24"
Finish High Heat Enamel
Dimensions (WDH) 72" x 24" x 31"
Weight 127 lb

entry.title: Crown Verity - Portable Commercial Outdoor Grill
entry.summary:
Vendor: Crown Verity
Type: BBQ
Price: 2250.00 - 3396.00 (2 variants)

Crown Verity's portable grills have been designed for caterers and rental applications. These grills are stackable for easy storage and transport.

These grills have been designed with protective crash bars on each side of the grill, and there are two crash bars on the front of the gill, which will keep the knobs and body of the grill safe during transportation. This grill has been designed with a high quality 304 stainless steel for durability and ease of cleaning. Compared to units made of metal or 430 stainless steel, these units are built to last.

These grills comes in liquid propane only, and include quick disconnect gas hose(s) with regulator(s) for the propane tanks.

      • Gas grill constructed of 304 stainless steel including grids, burners and all fasteners
      • Deep, 21" cooking surface
      • 15,000 BTUH stainless steel burners
      • Ready to use: ships completely assembled on a skid
      • Extra crash bars on the front and side of the grill
      • Includes water pans with drain ports to ease cleaning and help eliminate grease fires from occurring
      • 16 gauge stainless steel radiants that remain in place during transportation and cleaning
      • Buy Canadian! Made in Ontario! Buy a quality grill and support the economy

entry.title: Crown Verity - Mobile Commercial Outdoor Grill - Mobile Club Series
entry.summary:
Vendor: Crown Verity
Type: BBQ
Price: 5354.00 - 7506.00 (6 variants)

Crown Verity's Mobile Club Series has been built for the large caterer, golf club, and hotel. These grills are perfect for longer days and nights, because you won't have to worry about changing out your propane tank. It comes with two 50 pound vertical propane tanks, a remote propane cart, and two 25 foot disconnect gas hoses, giving you everything you need in one complete package. You can order this outdoor grill as 60" or 72", and with a roll dome and bun rack, or with windguards.

This commercial grill has been designed with high quality 304 stainless steel. Compared to 430, this is going to give you added durability, longevity, and it's going to be be much easier to keep clean and looking great.

The burners are each 15,000 BTUs per hour, and are evenly spaced every 5.75" to give you a very even cook and quick heat up (the grill can heat up within 5 minutes). The stainless steel burners have a 10 year warranty and the cooking grids have a lifetime warranty. Please note, the pictures shown are for illustration purposes only. The actual product may vary due to product enhancements and accessories.

      • Gas grill constructed of 304 stainless steel including grids, burners and all fasteners
      • Deep, 21" cooking surface
      • 15,000 BTUH stainless steel burners
      • Two 14" wheels and two total lock casters
      • Ready to use: ships completely assembled on a skid
      • Storage shelf and angled legs for rock solid durability
      • Includes water pans with drain ports to ease cleaning and help eliminate grease fires from occurring
      • 16 gauge stainless steel radiants that remain in place during transportation and cleaning
      • Two 50 pound vertical propane tanks, remote cart and two 25 foot quick disconnect hoses.
      • Buy Canadian! Made in Ontario! Buy a quality grill and support the economy

entry.title: Crown Verity - Mobile Commercial Outdoor Grill - Club Series
entry.summary:
Vendor: Crown Verity
Type: BBQ
Price: 4578.00 - 7201.00 (9 variants)

Crown Verity's Club Series has been designed specifically for country clubs, incorporating two 30 pound horizontal propane tanks, which improves the overall appearance of the grill and allows the unit to be used in a buffet line to serve customers.

The heavy duty brackets secure the propane tanks in place, and they've been designed to make placement and removal of the tanks effortless. The grill bodies, legs, cooking grates, burners, under shelves, radiants, water pans, fasteners, pilot tubes are all constructed of 304 series stainless steel for durability and ease of cleaning. Compared to units made of metal or 430 stainless steel, these units are built to last.

15,000 BTU-per-hour stainless steel burners are placed every 5.75" to ensure the most even heat pattern possible. These units heat up to cooking temperature within 5 minutes. The stainless steel burners carry a 10 year warranty, and the cooking grills carry a lifetime warranty. Please note, the pictures shown are for illustration purposes only. The actual product may vary due to product enhancement and accessories.

      • Gas grill constructed of 304 stainless steel including grids, burners and all fasteners

      • Storage shelf and angled legs for rock solid durability

entry.title: Crown Verity - Mobile Commercial Outdoor Grill - Pro Series, Rental Grill
entry.summary:
Vendor: Crown Verity
Type: BBQ
Price: 2906.00 - 5848.00 (18 variants)

Crown Verity's Pro Series of outdoor mobile grills has been designed specifically for the catering and rental markets. Compared to their standard mobile grills, these have been reinforced with double crash bars to protect the valves and knobs from being damaged during transportation, and they have handles built on each end. These outdoor grills are perfect for large scale events and companies who need to move their grill from place to place.

The Pro Series of grills comes in three different sizes: the 48", 60", and 72". And each size can be purchased standard or with a package. The roll dome package come with roll domes and bun racks and the wind guard packages come with wind guards.

These rental grills are only available in liquid propane. Each model will include two stage regulators and hoses and built-in tank holders that accommodate standard 20 pound propane tanks. Optionally, you can order the grill with a single gas connection and a 25 foot quick-disconnect hose to use with a remote tank. Please note, the pictures shown are for illustration purposes only. The actual product may vary due to product enhancement and accessories.

      • Gas grill constructed of 304 stainless steel including grids, burners and all fasteners
      • 15,000 BTUH stainless steel burners
      • Deep, 21" cooking surface
      • Two 14" wheels and two total lock casters
      • Ready to use: ships completely assembled on a skid
      • Tank holder(s) on back of unit that hold 20 lb. propane tank(s)
      • Storage shelf and angled legs for rock solid durability
      • Includes water pans with drain ports to ease cleaning and help eliminate grease fires from occurring
      • 16 gauge stainless steel radiants that remain in place during transportation and cleaning
      • Extra crash bars on the front and side lifetime warranty on body and cooking grids and 10 years on burners
      • Buy Canadian! Made in Ontario! Buy a quality grill and support the economy
